message.description: Required. The user's input for the model to respond to.

stream.description: Defaults to false. Set to true for a streamed response.

preamble.description: Optional. Adds SYSTEM role preamble content at the start of the conversation.

chat_history.description: Optional. List of previous messages providing conversational context.

conversation_id.description: Optional. A user-defined ID for persistent conversations.

response_format.description: Optional. Configuration for forcing the model to output JSON objects.

schema.description: Optional. JSON schema that the output will adhere to.

connectors.description: Optional. List of connectors to enrich the response using RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation).

user_access_token.description: Optional. User access token for connector authorization.

documents.description: Optional. List of documents to provide citations for generating responses.

temperature.description: Optional. Controls randomness in the modelâ€™s responses.

max_tokens.description: Optional. Maximum number of tokens in the model's response.
